chore(example): integrate expo to example app (#47)

* migrate to expo app

* add keyevent expo config plugin with a patch

As we are switching to expo, we need to use this plugin, but it is not adapted to Expo 50 for now, so we need to patch it.

* add readme to the hoppix application

* add ios troubleshooting to readme
